en.help_message: You can receive notifications when new posts are added to the registered RSS feed.
en.no_rss_feeds: You have no RSS feeds added.
en.waiting_for_rss: Please send me the RSS feed URL.
en.waiting_for_remove_rss: Please select the RSS feed you want to remove.
en.add_rss_message_key: Please send me the RSS feed URL.
en.prompt_enter_rss_url: Please enter the URL of the RSS feed you want to add
en.success_rss_added: The RSS feed has been added successfully.
en.error_rss_add_failed: Failed to add the RSS feed. Please try again.
en.cancel_rss_add: RSS feed addition has been canceled.
en.rss_already_exists: The RSS feed is already registered.
en.rss_max_limit: You can only register up to {MAX_RSS_FEEDS} RSS feeds.
en.invalid_rss_url: Invalid RSS URL. Please enter a valid URL.
en.click_to_view: Click the individual links to view all updates.

ko.help_message: RSS 피드를 등록하면 새글이 올라왔을 때 알림을 받을 수 있습니다.
ko.prompt_enter_rss_url: 추가할 RSS 피드의 URL을 입력해 주세요
ko.error_rss_add_failed: RSS 피드 추가에 실패했습니다. 다시 시도해 주세요.
ko.rss_max_limit: 최대 {MAX_RSS_FEEDS}개의 RSS 피드만 등록할 수 있습니다.
ko.invalid_rss_url: 유효하지 않은 RSS URL입니다. 올바른 URL을 입력해 주세요.
ko.click_to_view: 전체 업데이트를 확인하려면 개별 링크를 클릭하세요.
